channel.title: git on Jean Bilheux
channel.description: Recent content in git on Jean Bilheux

item.title: How to remove a file from git tracking
item.description: Let’s suppose you have a file you have been updated for a while (ex: .idea/workspace.xml) in your git repository but decided to remove it. You need to update your .gitignore file and add this file .idea/workspace.xml Remove all tracking files by cleaning the cached git rm -r –cached . commit changes git add . git commit -m “Here it is” git push
